title: Tour de France Stage 4: Tadej Poga훾ar Powers Back into Yellow With Galibier Sledgehammer
content:
Poga훾ar uncorks monster attack over summit to drop Vingegaard and gis rivals and gain close to one minute in the yellow jersey chase.

Read the full article at Tour de France Stage 4: Tadej Poga훾ar Powers Back into Yellow With Galibier Sledgehammer on Velo.
